snippet.title: SILICON WASTELAND - A Visual Novel (Wishlist now on Steam)
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2850200/Silicon_Wasteland/

Featuring the music of Vidboy, Janice Kwan, Lifeformed, and more to come, SILICON WASTELAND is a kinetic visual novel set during the twilight years of humanity, and follows the wandering android Silica, as she explores the beautiful and sometimes frightening wonders of the world, in an ongoing quest to discover her purpose.

https://vidboy.itch.io/silicon-wasteland

"Following a worldwide catastrophe, an android wakes up years later to the wind and rain of the quiet apocalypse. Damaged, low on power, and having no memories, she sets out into the nearby ruined city in search of answers."

This visual novel will be released in episodic installments. Each episode will be a free update.

Song: Imperfect, Yet Perfect
Artist: vidboy

Please consider supporting me:
https://twitter.com/vidboy_etc
https://linktr.ee/vidboy
